explanation.note: Model factors indicate association, not causality.

example.recommended_action: Verify prior authorization and documentation completeness

payload.description: Workflow payload object. Payload schema depends on `workflow`; see `x-workflowSchemas` for schema references.
payload.title: Payload

allow_fallback.description: When true, scoring can fall back to the current runtime model if `model_version` is unavailable. When false, unavailable version requests return 409.
allow_fallback.title: Allow Fallback

operating_point.description: Optional decision profile for denial scoring only (`workflow=healthcare.denial`). Ignored for other workflows.

score.description: Unified score output. For denial and prior-auth workflows, this is a calibrated probability (0-1). For reimbursement, this is a normalized risk score derived as `1 - reimbursement_ratio`.
score.title: Score

workflows.description: Currently supported workflows. Additional workflows may be added in future without breaking changes; clients should handle unknown workflow ids gracefully.
workflows.title: Workflows

info.description: Workflow-based scoring API for automated decision systems. Healthcare denial, prior-auth, and reimbursement workflows are supported first.
info.summary: Scoring primitives for automated decision workflows
info.title: Sentinel Signal API

post.summary: Beta (enterprise): generate an appeal draft downstream of denial risk

get.summary: Beta (enterprise): get persisted appeal drafts for a claim
Get persisted prior-auth predictions for a claim
Get persisted reimbursement estimates for a claim
Return plan limits for the current API token
Return usage report for current API key
